ccExchange(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,uin.details: Mints teleBTC for user if exchanging is not successful

params._blockNumber: Height of the block containing the user request
params._index: Index of transaction containing the user request in the block
params._intermediateNodes: Merkle inclusion proof for transaction containing the user request
params._lockerLockingScript: Script hash of locker that user has sent BTC to it
params._locktime: Lock time of the transaction containing the user request
params._version: Version of the transaction containing the user request
params._vin: Inputs of the transaction containing the user request
params._vout: Outputs of the transaction containing the user request

params._relay: The Relay address to validate data from source chain
params._startingBlockNumber: Requests that are included in a block older than _startingBlockNumber cannot be executed
params._treasury: Address of treasury that collects protocol fees

isRequestUsed(bytes32).details: It prevents re-submitting an executed request

params._txId: The transaction ID of request on source chain

returns._0: True if the cc exchange request has been already executed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

reDoFailedCcExchange(bytes,bytes32,bytes.details: Mints teleBTC for user if exchanging is not successful

params._message: Version of the transaction containing the user request

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setExchangeConnector(uint256,address).details: Only owner can call this. _exchangeConnector can be set to zero to inactive an app

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawFailedCcExchangeToBTC(bytes,byte.details: Mints teleBTC for user if exchanging is not successful

params._message: Version of the transaction containing the user request

CCExchange(bytes,uint256,address,address.notice: Emits when a cc exchange request gets done

FailedCCExchange(bytes,uint256,address,a.notice: Emits when a cc exchange request fails

NewTeleBTC(address,address).notice: Emits when changes made to TeleBTC address

NewTreasury(address,address).notice: Emits when changes made to Treasury address

SetExchangeConnector(uint256,address).notice: Emits when appId for an exchange connector is set

addSupportedExchangeToken(address).notice: Setter for a supported exchange token

ccExchange(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,uin.notice: Executes a cross-chain exchange request after checking its merkle inclusion proof

initialize(uint256,uint256,uint256,addre.notice: Gives default params to initiate cc exchange router

isRequestUsed(bytes32).notice: Check if the cc exchange request has been executed before

reDoFailedCcExchange(bytes,bytes32,bytes.notice: Executes a cross-chain exchange request after checking its merkle inclusion proof

removeSupportedExchangeToken(address).notice: Remover for a supported exchange token

setExchangeConnector(uint256,address).notice: Sets appId for an exchange connector

withdrawFailedCcExchangeToBTC(bytes,byte.notice: Executes a cross-chain exchange request after checking its merkle inclusion proof
